name: Song Birds (Chicken Salad Studio)
description:
Birds, assemble! It's time to feast on some fruits.

All You Can Feast

It’s fruit season in the tropical bird jungle, our friendly feathered friends are totally ready to fatten up after a long winter. They line up under the trees, beaks ready to open up.

Meet the birds Chico

The leader of the pack. Confident with a goofy side. Chico assembled all the birds and has the final say.

Guava

The goodie two shoes of the group. Always does what he’s told and follows the rules of the jungle.

Loki

The trickster, the prankster, the class clown. Always looking to entertain. Tries to make the other birds laugh and pranks them by hiding their fruit in tiny places only he can reach.

Bolo

The bad boy, every bird-lady swoons over. If you look too quick, you could think he’s a famous boy band member with all the birdies he attracts!

Dinnertime - Time to feast!

Tap your way to victory! Catch the falling fruit by tapping on the bird corresponding to the fruit. Make sure not to miss any fruits to finish the level and get the highest score!
